00021 #ifndef CLPP_DETAIL_INCORRECT_PARAMETERS_HPP
00022 #define CLPP_DETAIL_INCORRECT_PARAMETERS_HPP
00023 
00024 #include "common_checker.hpp"
00025 #include "../parameter.hpp"
00026 #include "../parameter_parts_extractor.hpp"
00027 
00028 #include <boost/assign.hpp>
00029 
00032 namespace clpp {
00033 
00036 namespace detail {
00037 
00038 typedef common_checker< parameters, parameter_parts_extractor, std::string > checker;
00039 
00040 using namespace boost::assign;
00041 
00047 class incorrect_parameters_checker : public checker {
00048 public:
00049     incorrect_parameters_checker( const parameters&                     registered_parameters
00050                                   , const parameter_parts_extractor&    extractor
00051                                   , const std::string&                  name_value_separator ) :
00052             checker( registered_parameters, extractor, name_value_separator ) {}
00053 public:
00054     void check( const str_storage& inputed_parameters ) const {
00055         str_storage names_of_incorrect_parameters;
00056         collect_names_of_incorrect_parameters_if_such_exists( inputed_parameters, names_of_incorrect_parameters );
00057         if ( !names_of_incorrect_parameters.empty() ) {
00058             notify_about_incorrect_parameters( names_of_incorrect_parameters );
00059         } else {}
00060     }
00061 private:
00062     void collect_names_of_incorrect_parameters_if_such_exists( const str_storage& inputed_parameters
00063                                                                , str_storage& names_of_incorrect_parameters ) const {
00064         BOOST_FOREACH ( const std::string& inputed_parameter, inputed_parameters ) {
00065             const std::string name = extractor.extract_name_from( inputed_parameter );
00066             parameter_const_it it = std::find( registered_parameters.begin()
00067                                                , registered_parameters.end()
00068                                                , name );
00069             if ( registered_parameters.end() == it ) {
00070                 names_of_incorrect_parameters += name;
00071             } else {}
00072         }
00073     }
00074 
00075     void notify_about_incorrect_parameters( const str_storage& names_of_incorrect_parameters ) const {
00076         std::string what_happened = lib_prefix() + "Parameter ";
00077         
00078         BOOST_FOREACH ( const std::string& name, names_of_incorrect_parameters ) {
00079             what_happened += "'" + name + "', ";
00080         }
00081         boost::erase_last( what_happened, ", " );
00082 
00083         if ( 1 == names_of_incorrect_parameters.size() ) {
00084             what_happened += " is incorrect (no such parameter)!";
00085         } else {
00086             boost::replace_first( what_happened, "Parameter", "Parameters" );
00087             what_happened += " are incorrect (no such parameters)!";
00088         }
00089 
00090         throw std::runtime_error( what_happened );
00091     }
00092 };
00093 
00094 } // namespace detail
00095 } // namespace clpp
00096 
00097 #endif // CLPP_DETAIL_INCORRECT_PARAMETERS_HPP
